name: Were You Ever Free?(GameJam version)
description:
There was  a problem when I tried to export the game for the community game jam so this is the version I made for it. I didn't even fixed the notable mistakes to be truth with the time limit. The version is the exact same I had yesterday.

Were You Ever Free?

A game that tries to explore free  will through the eyes of a corrupted AI.

Massive Omniscient Mastermind (MOM) was originally created to save humanity before the last war, but now she's twisted and is in crazy  search for a way to free every human.

Try and try again. She'll make you start again every time you fail.

You can only finish the game if you don't listen to her. She'll do anything to make you try again, the only way to end it is keep going even though she'll tell you otherwise.

Beware, she'll be watching you to do what she wants. Don't let MOM win.
